intent: Implement a real-time collaborative text editor with CRDT-based conflict resolution, cursor awareness, and offline-first behavior.
constraints: Must function offline for up to 7 days with automatic synchronization on reconnection
Support at least 50 concurrent editors per document
decisions: Cursor positions encoded as relative offsets
state_summary: Yjs document synchronization functional between peers. WebRTC signaling established. Cursor awareness implemented but inconsistent during rapid edits. Offline edit queue operational; reconnection after extended offline periods causes merge anomalies requiring investigation.
